<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"slug":{"type":"string","minLength":3,"pattern":"^[a-z0-9-]+$","description":"URL-friendly project identifier (lowercase, numbers, hyphens only)","example":"my-novel"},"title":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"description":"Project title","example":"My Novel"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional project description"}},"required":["slug","title"],"title":"CreateProjectRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Project created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique project identifier"},"slug":{"type":"string","description":"URL-friendly project identifier"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Project title"},"description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Project description"},"username":{"type":"string","description":"Project owner username"},"coverImage":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Cover image URL"},"createdDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Project creation date"},"updatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Last update date"}},"required":["id","slug","title","username","createdDate","updatedDate"],"title":"Project"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid input or project already exists","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"],"example":{"error":"An error occurred"},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"],"example":{"error":"An error occurred"},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"User not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"],"example":{"error":"An error occurred"},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
